segments.text: Welcome to Lincoln Bank . How may we be of service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . We'd like to open a Foreign Currency Account , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , do you have the relevant materials ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , yes , we do . Right here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . You have a choice of account , we provide USD , HAD , JOY and GAP accounts . Which do you want to go for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will go for the US dollar account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll begin the opening procedure now and we'll let you know when everything is sorted .
segments.speaker: S1
